Author: ziggy n
Summary: Using Azure Automation, back up the VHD OS and data disks of a specific virtual machine, or of all virtual machines in a cloud service. The backed up VHDs are saved to a new container in the existing storage account of the virtual machine.
Title: Backup all disks for a single Azure VM or for all VMs in a Cloud Service
UserTags: backup, Virtual Disk Drives, Windows Azure Virtual Machines
